date_badge_month.info: Edit month abbreviations in the theme languages
date_badge_month.label: Month

access_token.info: Log into your Eventbrite account to get your [Access token here](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/).
access_token.label: Access token

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#stock-level-indicator).
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Select the product quantity level that will trigger a low quantity message. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#stock-level-indicator).
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

show_untracked_quantity.label: Use "In stock" status for untracked quantities

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content

enable_payment_button.info: Let customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button

title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

collapse_on_mobile.info: Heading is required if this is enabled
collapse_on_mobile.label: Collapse on mobile

desktop_width.info: For best results, ensure all footer block widths add up to 100%
desktop_width.label: Desktop width

show_title_on_desktop.info: The heading is always shown on smaller screen sizes.
show_title_on_desktop.label: Show heading on desktop

title.info: The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

currency__header.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

language__header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

payment__header.info: Only shows icons for payment types that your store supports.

social_media__header.info: Configure account links in theme settings.

enable_transparent_home.info: Ensure that you have a Slideshow or Video hero section as the first section on your homepage.
enable_transparent_home.label: Enable on home page

logo_transparent.info: Default logo will be used if no image is set.
logo_transparent.label: Logo image

blog_show_pagination.info: Pagination will appear when you have multiple blog articles to display
blog_show_pagination.label: Show pagination

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the article content.
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

cart_ajax_enable.info: Updates the cart as soon as customer changes are made
cart_ajax_enable.label: Enable automatic cart updates

pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of products are navigated.
pagination.label: Pagination

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collection blocks.

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content. [Learn more about creating pages](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/pages).
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content. [Learn more about creating pages](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/pages).
content_max_width.label: Max width of content

image.info: Use an image with a 2:3 width to height ratio (recommended).
image.label: Image

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_estimator.info: Estimator will appear only if shipping rates exist [learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/setting-up-shipping-rates).
show_estimator.label: Show shipping estimator

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

heading.info: The heading will only appear when products are showing.
heading.label: Heading

product_source.info: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)
product_source.label: Products to show

products_list.info: Add a [product reference](/admin/metafields/product/create) (list of products) metafield to set different items for each product
products_list.label: Custom product list

subtext.info: Add instructions to describe how the custom text is applied to the product.
subtext.label: Instructions

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#stock-level-indicator).
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#stock-level-indicator)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

show_untracked_quantity.label: Use "In stock" status for untracked quantities

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

show_estimator.info: Estimator will appear only if shipping rates exist [learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/setting-up-shipping-rates).
show_estimator.label: Show shipping estimator

header__siblings.info: Display similar products as swatches. Set up "sibling" collections to group separate variant products using metafields. [Learn more](http://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/sibling-product-swatches)

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content

enable_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)
enable_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards

navigation_buttons__paragraph.content: To best preview the breadcrumbs and navigation buttons, navigate through any created collection to a product.

api_key.info: Register a Google Maps API key to display the map. Learn more about [registering a Google Maps API key](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/os/customize/map-section-api-key).
api_key.label: Google Maps API key

header.info: Map address and a valid Google Maps API key are required.

image.info: Displayed if the map isn’t loaded
image.label: Image

map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.
map_address.label: Map address

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

decline_age_link.info: Link to where users will be sent if they don't agree to the age verification. The default is your stores password page.
decline_age_link.label: Decline button link

intro_paragraph.content: Popups are great for pushing customers to a particular sale or promotion. However, too many popups can overwhelm shoppers and create the wrong impression. Select the popup type that works best for you and limit the total amount as much as possible.

paragraph__customization.content: Product recommendations are dynamically generated or can be manually assigned with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

paragraph__intro.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

likes.info: Misleading customers with fake numbers could fall under “unfair or deceptive acts or practices” in the [FTC Act](https://ca.practicallaw.thomsonreuters.com/w-007-7584).
likes.label: Number of likes

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

contrast__header.info: Choose "Use alternate section color" at the bottom of a section's settings to use this secondary color scheme there.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

navigation__header.info: These settings only apply to the header on desktop when you have selected the links style of header in your header settings.

chip_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying chips. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Size, Material, Fabric".
chip_options.label: Variant option for chips

custom_swatch_colors.info: Add one color per line. Enter the exact variant option name followed by a colon and hex code. Ex: "Sky Blue: #87CEEB". [Learn more](http://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/swatches)
custom_swatch_colors.label: Custom swatch colors

enable_dynamic_product_options.info: Dynamically updates the appearance of swatch/chip options based on their availability. This saves customers from the effort of trying to add variants that are no longer available.
enable_dynamic_product_options.label: Enable

swatch_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Colour"
swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches

show_quick_add_quantity.info: If disabled product quantity will default to 1.
show_quick_add_quantity.label: Enable hover add-to-cart quantity selector

show_quick_cart_after_quick_add.info: Cart type must be set to Fly-out
show_quick_cart_after_quick_add.label: Show fly-out cart after product added to cart

show_swatches_and_chips.info: Reveals product options on hover. To learn more about setting up swatches and chips, check out our [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#variant-chips).
show_swatches_and_chips.label: Show swatches and chips

contrast_spacer.label: Show spacer between alternate color sections

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

time_zone_selection.info: Select the time zone you want the countdown to be displayed in
time_zone_selection.label: Time zone

header__country.info: To add a country, go to your [markets settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

enable_animation.info: Ensure section animations are enabled in the theme settings
enable_animation.label: Enable animation
